Reference

All functions

calc_PPR_scaled()

Scale PPR index by toal production

calc_fogarty_index()

Calculate the Fogarty index

calc_friedland_index()

Calculate the Friedland index

calc_mtl_index()

Calculate the mean Trophic Level

calc_ppr_index()

Calculate the PPR index

calc_ryther_index()

Calculate the Ryther index

capitalize_first_letter()

Capitalize first letter of string

explore_species_composition()

Explores species composition based on landings

get_annual_PP()

Reads primary production data

get_trophic_level()

Obtain trophic level data from rfishbase

plot_mtl_index()

Plot the mean trophic level index

plot_pp_index()

Plot the Primary Production

plot_ppr_index()

Plot the Primary Production Required index (scaled)

select_top_x_percent()

Select species in top x of landings

select_troph()

Combine trophic level data
